item.description:
Foundation Rites of the Munay-Ki - gifting group
Saturday, February 23, 9:30-noon with Judy
$20 requested donation to support space rental
The Rites of the Munay-Ki are energetic initiations to help us step into our full power and potential as lightbearers and stewards of the earth.  These are seeds of light, given through an initiation process that holds the energy of the anciient  lineage  of Peruvian shamans.
   This gifting group will begin with a video of Alberto Villodo explaining the Rites. Each participant will receive the four Foundation Rites: The Healer's Rite, The Bands of Protection and Power, the Seers Rite and the Harmony Rite. Read more at www.Munay-Ki.org. Judy is a Munay-Ki graduate. This will be a sacred circle, with opening ceremony to honor the four directions, a meditation and fire ceremonyt for each Rite, and individual gifting of the Rites.

group.name: The Salem MA Meditation Meetup Group

item.name: Foundation Rites of the Munay-Ki gifting group
